arts.ttl: Two Premier League clubs in transfer battle with RB Leipzig for England U21 starlet
arts.sum: Southampton starlet Tyler Dibling is expected to be in high demand over the summer but his Premier League suitors are expected to face competition from the Bundesliga

arts.ttl: Nwaneri marks full England U21 debut with goal in win
arts.sum: Ethan Nwaneri marked his full England Under-21s debut with a goal in their 4-2 friendly victory over Portugal at The Hawthorns.

arts.ttl: Man City star James McAtee reveals Pep Guardiola will let him decide if he will play at the Club World Cup or U21 Euros this summer
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT IN LORIENT: McAtee is an integral part of Lee Carsley's Under-21 side and the City midfielder is one of just four survivors from the squad that won the last Euros.
